sourcesContent:
import { TableContainer, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, Typography, ListItem } from "@mui/material"; import { useStoreContext } from "../../App/Context/StoreContext"; import { Basket } from "../../App/Models/Basket"; export default function BasketSummary() { const {basket} = useStoreContext(); const subtotal = basket.basket?.items.reduce((sum, item) => sum * item.quantity, 0);; const deliveryFee = 0; return ( <> Subtotal {subtotal} Delivery fee* {deliveryFee} Total *Orders over $100 qualify for free delivery
) }
